pages.text: Vault Potions are used to $(l)regenerate health$() inside of Vaults.$(br2)They are crafted by the player in a $(l)Crafting Table$().$(br2)They can be modified to also apply temporary $(l)modifiers$() to the player after consumption.$(br2)After $(l)exiting$() a Vault, the Vault Potion gets $(l)reset$() to its $(l)initial$() state.

pages.title: Variants
pages.text: Each Vault Potion has $(l)6 charges$() at the $(l)start$() of a Vault. Drinking the Vault Potion $(l)requires a charge$().$(br2)These charges can be regenerated depending on the $(l)recharger$() used by the Vault Potion.$(br2)Only $(l)one$() Vault Potion is $(l)functional$() inside of a Vault.

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: $(br)There are various tiers of Vault Potions. This determines the $(l)health$() it $(l)regenerates$() and the number of $(l)modifiers$().$(br2)The available tiers are:$(br)$(li)$(l)Vial$()$(li)$(l)Potion$()$(li)$(l)Mixture$()$(li)$(l)Brew$()$(br2)All tiers, except Vials, are locked behind $(l)Research$().

pages.title: Rechargers
pages.text: $(br)Each Vault Potion also has a recharger that is $(l)determined$() upon $(l)crafting$() it.$(br2)The recharger is the method of $(l)regenerating$() a $(l)charge$() on the Vault Potion.$(br2)The recharge can either occur every $(l)5 minutes$() or every $(l)150 mob unalived$().
